document_data.mainbody:
Nine Stars Around a Silver Moon was a ballad penned by a famed adventuring bard Mintiper Moonsilver, also known as The Lonely Harpist, in the early 14 century DR.
Nine Stars Around a Silver Moon was published in the  By the late 15 century, a book compiled by Silke Rosena â€“ Sword Coast Songbook, contained lyrics and sheet music for Nine Stars Around a Silver Moon and made available in the city of Baldurs Gate.
